archimate:BusinessService.name: IT Financial Management (Business Service)
archimate:BusinessService.documentation: Defining processes for accounting, budgeting, and charging for IT services. Includes, but not limited to: Defining value of services by taking into account all costs. acquiring total cost information, relating to Logical architecture, comparision to trends and prior estmates, deciding what has overheads and how overheads are allocated to a cost structure.
